Attributes.description: Rigid body kinetics and kinematics, basic electrical circuits, work and power, stress and strain, torsion, bending, engineering materials, probability and statistics. This course includes the content of ELEC 203.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of MATH 101, MATH 152, PHYS 158, PHYS 170 and one of BMEG 102, PHYS 159 and one of APSC 176, ENGL 112, WRDS 150.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Frank, Room: Forward
